Name: HMS Brocklesby
awards: ENGLISH CHANNEL 1942-43 - DIEPPE 1942 - SICILY 1943 - SALERNO 1943 - ATLANTIC 1943 - ADRIATIC 1944
Badge: On a field red, a buckle gold
Displacement:
1,000 long tons (1,000 t) standard
1,360 long tons (1,380 t) full load
Propulsion:
2 Admiralty 3-drum boilers
2 shaft Parsons geared turbines, 19,000 shp (14,000 kW)
Armament:
4 × QF 4-inch (102 mm) Mark XVI on twin mounts Mk. XIX
4 × QF 2 pdr Mk. VIII on quad mount
2 × 20 mm Oerlikons on single mounts
40 × depth charges
